page.title: 12OUR SCHOOL DAY
page.content:
Gone are the days when school only consisted of{Reading Writing}and{ {Arithmetic
We took part in an experiment this year called{Daily Physical Education} and it was great !
To start with it was{Body conditioning Every day we did floor exercises and jogging to improve our flexibility and stamina and to prepare us for the{ {DANCE }GYMNASTICS and{GAMES}schemes to follow
We found it especially good for getting fit so you had a better chance of getting into one of the School Teams,like{VOLLEYBALL}BADMINTON or{ {FOOTBALL }
